note: Participants were diagnosed according to DSM-III(-R) criteria for major depressive disorder in the Baltimore Epidemiologic Catchment Area Survey, conducted between 1985â€“2005.
title: Share who recalled lifetime depression
subtitle: The same group of people were interviewed years apart about episodes of depression they had so far. Some had new episodes, while some failed to recall episodes that they described before. This shows the share who recalled lifetime depression at an interview versus in any interview.
